item.title: Helping Secure Signal's Post-Quantum Transition
item.description: Signal just announced the deployment of their new post-quantum ratcheting protocol, called the Sparse Post-Quantum Ratchet (SPQR), and Cryspen is proud to have contributed to the formal analysis of the design and implementation of this new Signal feature.
